column4: Hello! I am at a small network and a Ubuntu box acts as a gateway to the internet for my LAN .. it does NAT and is a DHCP server + firewall. any ideas on how I can block bittorrent in my LAN?
Why not build your small firewall with iptables and something like fwbuilder as gui?
You can only block the known bittorrent ports and hope your users are not very intelligent ;)
